name: Block Run (KyokiGames)
description:
Block Run

Basically you are a block that moves and you have to dodge other blocks, that simple.
This is my first game and it is still in development, it will go very slowly since I do not have much time and this is just a hobby.

Possibly try to make a more complete game with a story and more development but for now this is all I can achieve.

At the moment only has 5 maps but I hope in the future to add more if the game receives support.
